entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
